text: 🚨Russian troops advance in eastern Ukraine! 🚨💣 Ukrainian commander-in-chief Oleksandr Syrskyi reports significant gains by Russian forces near Avdiivka, a Russian-occupied industrial town. 💥🤯 Ukrainian Defense Ministry denies capture of Bohdanivka, but admits intense fighting is ongoing. 🔥💔 Russian forces have been actively attacking Ukrainian positions in three areas of the eastern Donetsk region, near Lyman, Bakhmut, and Pokrovsk. 😨🤷‍♂️ Russia has a clear advantage in firepower and personnel, putting Ukraine at risk. 💪🚨 We must continue to support Ukraine in their fight for freedom and sovereignty! 🇺🇦
